body: John, that is quality. Only suitable for xxl t shirts. Regards Andrew Cundall Light4 0161 200 1235 07899 907 978 -----Original Message----- Sent: 28 July 2011 14:06 To: radiance-general at radiance-online.org The warning should be updated -- I have a suggestion: "Warning - no light sources found. Wait a mo', you're NOT doing a daylight factor calculation, ARE YOU? I mean, really, in this day and age. Or could it be the clear sky option in LEED? Think about it: a clear sky WITHOUT sun - a physically impossible illumination condition in nature! Isn't that just a bit weird? No, no, don't hit Ctrl-C, I haven't finished..."
